name: Tea Puzzle
description: Tea Puzzle is a game where you need to help a bag of tea to collect all water points from the map. It is not so easy due to various obstacles laying on the path. Tea is always following the light of an active lantern, you as a tea guide can change the active lantern and move boxes to unlock passages. When you manage to get water, tea needs to find a cozy teapot. It takes about two hours to complete the whole game, have fun!
